page.title: 16FOLK CUSTOMS
page.content: In a year lots of festivals go on throughout the area, for instance the School Fayre & Cavaliers Disco. The Cavaliers are a fund raising charity organisation; the barn dance; the Flower festival and the Harvest festival. The{School Fayre}is held once a year at the school Annexe site, with lots of stalls and games. There are also ice-creams and hot dogs. The{ {Flower Festival} is run by the Methodist church and our class had to draw pictures of flowers. Each {November the 5th}we have a bomfire and firework display in a large field to commemorate Guy Fawkes death. The church holds a fate once a year and the procedes go to charity.
